content.22: Judas saith unto him, not Iscariot, Lord, how is it that thou wilt manifest thyself unto us, and not unto the world?

content.27: Peace I leave with you, my peace I give unto you: not as the world giveth, give I unto you. Let not your heart be troubled, neither let it be afraid.

content.29: And now I have told you before it come to pass, that, when it is come to pass, ye might believe.
content.30: Hereafter I will not talk much with you: for the prince of this world cometh, and hath nothing in me.
content.31: But that the world may know that I love the Father; and as the Father gave me commandment, even so I do. Arise, let us go hence.
